help-file.title: "GROUP STORNOGS SPHERES"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: N/A Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster or until dispelled Type of spell: Protection
"Group stornogs spheres" brings into existence a series of orange that rotate around the caster as well as anyone grouped with him. These spheres absorb magical energies directed at anyone protected by them, leaving those protected unharmed. The amount of energy the spheres can absorb depends on the casters' level.
